text: (Tumhi) sanga ki mi tara tumacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe. Majhyavara vahayi (prakasana) keli jata ahe ki tumha sarvanca mabuda (upasya) kevala eka allahaca ahe, tevha tumhi tyacyakade dhyana kendrita kara ani tyacyakade aparadhanci ksama maga ani tya aneka isvarancya upasakankarita sarvanasa ahe
